name: Bike Hill Race . Dirtbike Offroad Mountain Racing
name_original: Bike Hill Race . Dirtbike Offroad Mountain Racing
description:
Have fun as never before in this bike racing game in which you will cross different worlds!

You'll not forget this crazy race in which you'll climb and jump hills with great accuracy!

Choose one of the four stunning motorcycles and start racing through the hills!

Perform all types of loops, jumps and stunts while having great fun in this wonderful motorcycle racing game!
